DOC.brief_summary: The investigator goal optimise physical activity intervention help previously inactive woman improve body shape composition . Many people seek lose weight improve body composition initiate exercise programme . The common recommendation exercise intervention someone attempt manage weight , 'prescribe ' recommend 150 minute exercise per week ( World Health Organisation ) , often use one mode exercise . An alternative approach might offer portfolio activity , exerciser pick choose , facilitate great amount physical activity . The problem account different intensity walk , wash car , play badminton , cycling , jogging , etc ? In study , investigator try overcome barrier allocate number `` physical activity point '' activity . Using physical activity point system , participant provide point target meet use combination activity . The investigator research aim therefore compare points-based system traditional 5x30minute prescription ( sedentary control ) ability help previously inactive woman drop dress size , increase fat burning , positively change body composition tone tummy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Physical Activity Intervention Flexibility Time Course Changes Body Composition Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Female Aged 2550 year old Inactive ( less 150 minute moderateintensity aerobic physical activity per week ) BMI 2535 kg/m2 Good general health , assessed School Sport , Exercise Rehabilitation Sciences ' General Health Questionnaire Willing strictly comply study procedure restriction Willing participate , demonstrate voluntary write informed consent Positive result urine sample pregnancy test Currently breast feed Currently participate another clinical trial deem potentially interfere study Current recent ( within last 30 day ) smoker Currently take prescription nonprescription medication may interfere metabolism ( include betablockers , insulin , bronchodilator , antiinflammatory agent , thyroxine medication/supplements opinion investigator may affect metabolism ) .
